page.title: 13Major Roads in the Area
page.content: The traffic that goes through{St. {Albans}may be coming from{Watford}and going to{Hatfield,}or the other way round, travelling along the{A405.}The traffic may be coming from{Carlisle}to {Potters Bar}along the{A6}which joins on to the{A1}and goes to{London.}The {A1}goes from the{north}of the country to the centre of{London.}Traffic might be travelling along the{A5}going all the way beyond{Tamworth}from{St. {Albans.}The{A414}joins{Welwyn Garden {City}and{Hemel Hempstead.}The{B651 goes to{Luton.}The{M1}and the{M25}pass close to{St. Albans}and affect traffic conditions in the area. The{M25}will go through part of{London Colney}which should reduce the amount of traffic passing through St. Albans. The{M25 will provide a complete loop around {London.
